name: HeroStory
description:
Element perception!!! ∑(ﾟДﾟノ)ノ

No numerical value
Non random
Small volume
Insufficient funds (T ▽ T)

A less serious introduction | ू ω･` )

At first, no one cared about the rainstorm...
The continent that exists outside the mainland, sleeping soundly in the embrace of the Sea of Death, waiting for people to arrive.
Rich soil, enchanting crystals, whispers lingering in my ears... On this unfamiliar land, the mysterious and ancient altar transforms into a arena of blood and soul, offering endless wealth to welcome warriors from all sides!

One sentence gameplay explanation罒ω罒

Expand your territory, deploy chess pieces, release skills, and expand your power.
Eliminate opponents, summon ancient gods, soar spiritual power, and achieve ultimate victory!
